::Battera::

She rolled onto her side and gasped in pain.  She cried.  She coun't 
really move at all.  The wound sent waves of pain through her body.  
She cried and whispered, "CYbershark,   I love you." She closed her 
eyes and passed out, laying on her side, in a growing puddle of mech 
fluid.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark/Dark Prime::
> 
>     CyberShark's normaly blue eyes went to a crimson Red. His hand 
blade started to spin and he went after Dark Prime. Prime moved 
quicker than CyberShark and his sword came down inbetween the blades 
of CyberShark's hand. CyberShark pulled out his gun and fired two 
missles at Prime. Prime was hit, he got up, leaking mech fluid and 
ran off.
>     "If she dies, I will hunt you to the ends of the Earth!" 
CyberShark roared after him. He picked up Battera and rushed her into 
the CF, looking for a CR Chamber.
>     "Where are the CR Chambers in this slagging ship?!"

>   Sh felt the blade slide into her abdoman.  She gasped in pain and 
>   fear.  She looked at him, then fell to the floor.  Her body 
shook, 
>   leaking badly and laying in a puddle of mech fluid.  She 
whispered,"I 
>   was here for thepeace talks. I was going to become a maximal..." 
She 
>   closed her eyes.  She was filled with fear.  She 
>   whispered, "Cybershark...I tried....Cybershark" 
> 
>

>   --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:

>   > 
>   >     "Ahh, yes," He said noticing Battera. "Battera. I remember 
you, 
>   but I'm sure you don't remember me. I saved you once from 
>   Wolveritron. Well, I'm here to return something, and then I'll be 
on 
>   my way."
>   >     He thrust his Dark sword at Battera's abdomen.
>   >     CyberShark came into sight of the CF at that moment and 
began 
>   rushing to the CF. He was nearly blind with fear.
>   >     Wolveritron stepped in front of him and extended his blades.
>   >     "We don't accept Predacons 'round here," He said.
>   >     CyberShark shoved him out of the way and continued 
running...
